bodyV2.markdown:
The epic nature of this new Harry Potter story means that Harry Potter and the Cursed Child has been created in two parts. Each part is equally crucial to the overall story and so it is encouraged that both parts are seen together. It is recommended that both parts are seen consecutively but if this is not practical you can book separate Parts across different days of the week. Please note that weekend performances must be booked as consecutive performances.Â 

Book Tickets

content.name: Is Harry Potter and the Cursed Child play in 2 parts?
